title: Green Garden Soup
ingredients: ['1.4L (2 3/8 pints) vegetable stock', '1 onion, chopped', '1 carrot, sliced', '2 stalks celery, sliced', '50g (2 oz) white rice', '100g (4 oz) fresh spinach, washed and chopped', '2 little gem lettuces, torn', '2 handfuls chopped fresh flat leaf parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 pinch cayenne pepper']
